name: Escape from RosSpell
description:
Part of the RedEye Hackday2018

Having just crash landed in Roswell, you must quickly learn the language to make good your escape.

Type your commands, find new commands along the way and reach the keys to escape.

Written in 24 hours by a team of 2 people who couldn't decide if they wanted to make a platformer or a text adventure so they mashed them up.
